com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing

Class TransformationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing.TransformationManager

  • public class TransformationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jcharles This class processes all the transforms defined in the RuleSet (originally loaded from the DSL rules.xml file) to be applied to the Input DOM Document.

      • process

        public void process()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Apply all the rules in the rules set to the input document.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if an error occurs during the execution of rules in the rule set

      • processRule

        private void processRule(IRule rule)
                  throws TransformException
        Throws:
        TransformException

      • processPartition

        private void processPartition(IRule rule,
                              java.lang.String baseXPath,
                              boolean hasFolder,
                              boolean hasDocument,
                              boolean hasSection,
                              boolean hasTask)
                       throws TransformException
        Process a partitioning rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - Rule
        baseXPath - Base document XPath
        hasFolder - Flag to indicate if the partition has a folder
        hasDocument - Flag to indicate if the partition has a document
        hasSection - Flag to indicate if the partition has a section
        hasTask - Flag to indicate if the partition has a task
        Throws:
        TransformException - Exception thrown if an error occurs processing partition
